kri.pu 668-625 di pamana asiriyawe wisu asurkhanipal raju wisin rachanakarana lada tharaka widya puwaru wishala sankhyawak thanpath kara thibubawa warthawe.thawada mese thanpath kara thibu thawath lekhanayak kri.pu 3800 wisu palawana sargon rajuge kalayata ayath bawa warthawe.me ayurin asiriyanuwo dinapatha grahalokayanhi hasirim ratawa nirikshanayakara eewa gananaya kota eewaye warthawan sada athibawata warthawe.mema warthawan asurkhanipal raju wisin anekuth nagara walata bedadi athibawath pasu kaleka mema mema warthamagin anawaki palakalabawath ema anawaki palakirime karyaya pujakawarunge karayak bawata pathwuna bawath ithihasaye sandahanwe.pujyasthanawala wishala gal kulunu idikota gena sarala upakarana magin ahasa nirikshanaya kara anawaki palakalaha.babiloniyawe babalge kuluna meyata shakshi darayi.ewakata handunagena thibune grahaloka pahak pamani.mema grahaloka paha saha hiru ,sandu pilibanda owunge wimasillata lakwiya.thawada mema yugayehi owun sathuwa kalaya manina oralosuwak wani yamak thibi athi bawa purawidya granthawala sandahanwa atha.
